name: Lava Network
highlight: Lava is a protocol that allows apps to access accurate blockchain data, scalably, privately and uncensored. The protocol will support Avalanche RPC.
summary: Lava is a protocol that allows apps to access accurate blockchain data, scalably, privately and uncensored. Using cryptography and token-aligned incentives, the protocol holds RPCs endpoints accountable for data integrity and service quality. Node runners earn income by providing RPC service, while contributing towards decentralization.
